org.placeName: Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT, WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, NORTHERN DIVISION.
Ex Parte Charles M. Helmore, Petitioner. ORDERL 3385

Upon the application of the United States Marshal for an order of court authorizing him to incur the expense of transporting one Charles M. Helmore from Tacoma to Seattle and return for the purpose of answering a petition for a writ of habeas corpus filed in the above court, the Marshal of this court is hereby

ORDERED and DIRECTED to incur the said expense in the matter of transporting the said Charles M. Helmore from Tacoma to Seattle and return in response to a petition for a writ of habeas corpus filed in said cause.
Done in chambers this 19th day of July, 1916.
Jeremiah Neterer United States District Judge.
IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, NORTHERN DIVISION.
Ex Parte Charles M. Helmore, Petitioner.
FILED IN THE U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, Northern Division JUL 21 1916 FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk, By Deputy
